articles.author: Bleacher Report Olympics Staff
articles.description: In true Olympic fashion, the marquee gold medals were scattered across the planet on Day 5 of the Tokyo Games.   Japan's Daiki Hashimoto won the all-around competition in men's gymnastics...
articles.title: Tokyo Summer Olympics 2021: Day 5 Winners and Losers
articles.content:
Team USA's Katie LedeckyMaddie Meyer/Getty Images
Over the past decade, one thing has been certain: When Katie Ledecky reaches the final of a swimming event, she ends up on the podium shortly therea… [+1379 chars]
